description: The pontiff, looking strong after recent health problems, renewed his vows on Holy Thursday and reminded the priests assembled in St. Peter’s to look within and repent, “acknowledging with sorrow our duplicity, dishonesty and hypocrisy.”
title: Pope Francis tells priests to consider their own sins in Holy Thursday address

description: THE NEGEV DESERT, Israel — As the sun set Sunday, a handful of people filed into a dining hall in a quiet village in the Negev desert for a shared iftar, the sunset meal that breaks the Ramadan fast, that hosts hoped would offer a small ray of intercommunal light at a time of intense divisions stoked by the deadly Israel-Hamas war.
title: At a Ramadan meal, Palestinian Bedouin invite Jewish Israelis to the table

description: NBC News filmed the aftermath of an airstrike that killed and wounded civilians living in tents in a supposedly safe area of Rafah, where they had been told to move by the Israeli military. 11-year-old Rima Bilal Shabeer was among the victims.
title: ‘Tell me, my love, what’s wrong with you?’: Grief-stricken Gazan father’s appeal to his dying daughter

description: U.K.'s King Charles III, who is undergoing treatment for cancer, praised people who "extend the hand of friendship, especially in a time of need," in a recorded message aired at the ancient Maundy Thursday church service.
title: Britain's King Charles praises 'hand of friendship' in an Easter message

description: King Charles III will deliver an Easter message on Thursday stressing the importance of friendship after Princess Kate's cancer diagnosis, at the Maundy Thursday service at Worcester Cathedral.
title: King Charles stresses importance of friendship 'in a time of need' after Princess Kate cancer diagnosis

description: Xiaomi, a well-known maker of smart consumer electronics in China, is joining the country’s booming but crowded market for electric cars.
title: China’s latest EV is a ‘connected’ car from smartphone maker Xiaomi

description: Russia will not attack Poland, the Baltic states or the Czech Republic, but if the West supplies F-16 fighters to Ukraine then they will be shot down by Russian forces, President Putin said.
title: Putin says Russia has no designs on NATO countries but will shoot down F-16s supplied to Ukraine

description: Johnny Celestin generally believes that Haiti, which continues to be under heightened violence from armed groups and gangs, must re-establish order on its own.
title: Why some Haitians don’t want foreign nations intervening in their crises — and others do

description: Exchanges of fire have escalated across the tense border between Israel and Lebanon, leading to wider concern that the war between Israel and Hamas might spread. NBC News' Claudio Lavanga reports for Early Today and brings news of a Gallup poll that shows an increase in disapproval among Americans for Israel's military action.
title: Exchanges of fire across the Lebanon-Israel border escalate
